item.description: Some notes References: https://github.com/forthright48/notes/blob/master/books/computer-networking.md https://blog.yfxie.com/comparison-of-network-gbn-sr-and-tcp/ 中文版在下面 — English Version — Transport Layer Two important protocols: UDP and TCP This article will mainly focus on how reliable transmission works. To be reliable Error checking, checksum Detect lost packets (timeout, etc.) Feedback from receiver to make sure they have received, which might lose as well. Retransmisison It’ll be slow if it waits for receiver’s feedback after sending
